広がり: (ひろがり) - spread; span; expanse; extent
広がる: (ひろがる) - to spread (out); to extend; to stretch; to reach to; to get around; to fill (e.g. a space)
広く: (hiroku) - amplamente, por toda parte, extensivamente, universalmente
広げる: (ひろげる) - (広げる, 拡げる only) to spread/to extend/to expand/to enlarge/to widen/to broaden; to unfold/to open/to unroll/to unwrap; (広げる, 拡げる only) to scatter about/to spread around; (広げる, 拡げる only) to make flourish/to cause to prosper
広まる: (ひろまる) - to spread; to be propagated
広め: (ひろめ) - making something widely known; introduction; debut; announcement; unveiling
広める: (ひろめる) - to spread/to propagate/to popularize/to disseminate; to broaden/to extend/to widen/to enlarge
広原: (こうげん) - wide plain or field
広口: (ひろくち) - a wide mouth; wide-mouthed (bottle)
広口瓶: (ひろくちびん) - jar; widemouthed bottle
